qas.q: Do the rates include travel or accommodation?
qas.a: No, all rates exclude travel and accommodation. This will be added in the final quote.
A performer leads guests through fun tasks for ~3045 minutes. See the Prices page for details.

qas.q: What do I need for a show?
qas.a: Provide a change room, water, a low armless chair, a suitable performance area with guests in a semi-circle, and a loud sound system. Keep the bachelorette/bachelor conscious enough to enjoy the show. Lock away pets.
